Even though the 12-589 radio is a piece of crap, i still=
 try and work on it to make it better.=C2=A0 I finally got all the voltages=

I love this =
chip though, really blows away the LM324 that i had been using.=C2=A0 Thank=
s Jeff for letting me know about it.=C2=A0 If it wasn't for Jeff guiding my=
 path, i'm not sure i'd be doing anything worthwhile.

I think 2011 i=
s the year i start understanding more, some stuff is actually making sense =

o.
